constituent: cotton, thread, spiderman, napkin, white, dove, towel
koohiiStory1: Spiderman´s polyethylene suit starts to ride up after a while, so he always looks forward to the white cotton towels he wears while lounging around his apartment.
koohiiStory2: Cotton is the preferred thread for making white towels.
words:
木綿(きわた): cotton
綿(めん): raw cotton
綿(わた): cotton, padding
